column2: Do you realize that four weeks from today we\xc2\x92re getting married?\nFour weeks baby!! Four weeks!!!'
Do you realize you get louder each week?'
There\xc2\x92s still so much to do. Have you written your vows yet?'
I figured I\xc2\x92d buy those. Pat, I\xc2\x92d like to buy a vow.\n(Laughs)'
Sweetie, you know I have no sense of humor when it comes to the wedding.'
Right. So uh, have you written yours yet?'
No! But I know exactly what I\xc2\x92m going to say.'
Do you happen to know what I\xc2\x92m going to say?'

(handing him a pad of paper and a pen) Let\xc2\x92s just do it right now.\nOkay? It won\xc2\x92t be hard. Just say what\xc2\x92s in your heart. (She goes back, sits\ndown, and starts feverishly writing.)'
(watching in her) (in his head) Look at her go! She must love me\nmore than I love her! What\xc2\x92s wrong with me? Ooh, don\xc2\x92t open that door.'
(writing) Monica, there are no words\xc2\x85 (To Joey and Ross) There\nare no words! This should not be this hard!'
All right, uh\xc2\x85 (To Ross) Oh hey, you\xc2\x92ve done this before Ross,\nwell what did you say when you made up your vows?'
Well with Carol, I promised never to love another woman until the day I\ndie. She made no such promise.'
I\xc2\x92m so pathetic! Monica knows what she wants to say! You\nshould\xc2\x92ve seen her. Writing, writing, writing!'
Monica what? '
What?!'
What is the emergency?!'
You have to help me! I\xc2\x92m supposed to be writing my vows and all I\nhave is this! (Shows them what she\xc2\x92s been working on.)'
Well, I like the pretty little drawing of you in the wedding dress.'
Thank you.'
Yeah, except your breasts look kinda small. (Points.)'
Those are my eyes! Those are my breasts. (Points.)'
Oh! Yeah! (Monica glares at her.)'
Well, why don\xc2\x92t you just start with something simple. Like umm,\nMonica from the moment I met you, I knew I loved you.'
Yeah, I\xc2\x92m not sure I can do that.'
...everyone, this is Chandler!'
Hi, I'm Ross's little sister."
(seeing her) Okay.'
Okay. Okay. Okay. Umm, maybe you can start with, "Chandler, even\nthough we were friends; there was a part of me that always knew I wanted more."'
All right, there\xc2\x92s a nuclear holocaust, I\xc2\x92m the last man on\nEarth. Would you go out with me?'
Ennnh.'
Ooh, are we allowed to lie in the vows?!'

Well maybe you don\xc2\x92t talk about your feelings back then. Maybe you
just say something about y\xc2\x92know all the things that he\xc2\x92s taught you. Like\xc2\x85
(They all try to think about one example and don\xc2\x92t succeed.) Or all the things you
taught him.'
Now everybody knows the basic erogenous zones. (She starts labelling\nthem) You got one, two three, four (Chandler is shocked to find out there\xc2\x92s more than\nthree), five, six, and seven!'
(shocked) There are seven?! (Points to one) That\xc2\x92s one?'
It\xc2\x92s kind of an important one!'
Oh, y\xc2\x92know-y\xc2\x92know what, I was looking at it upside down.'
Well, y\xc2\x92know, sometimes that helps. (She realises what that\ncould\xc2\x92ve meant.)'

All right. Umm, you could uh start out with a little 1, a 2, a 1-2-3, 3,
5, a 4, a 3-2, 2, a 2-4-6, 2-4-6, 4, (Rachel starts getting worked up) 2, 2, 4-7, 5-7,
6-7, 7 \xc2\x857..\xc2\x857\xc2\x857-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7\xc2\x85(mouths 7)! (They both lean back
on the couch satisfied.)'
Oh, I got it! How about saying something like, "Monica\xc2\x85'
(writing) Monica\xc2\x85'
"\xc2\x85when I look back over our time together\xc2\x85"'
(writes what Joey said and waits for him to go on) Yeah?'
Well, I can\xc2\x92t do everything! Look back over your time together.'
Oh, look, twins. Hi, guys. Oh, cute, cute.'
No fair. I don't even have one. How come they get two?"
You'll get one."
Oh yeah? When?'
All right. I'll tell you what. When we're 40, if neither one of us are\nmarried, what do you say you and I get together and have one?"
Why won't I be married when I'm 40?"
Oh, no, no. I just meant hypothetically.'
Ok, hypothetically, why won't I be married when I'm 40?"
No, no, no.'
What is it? Is there something fundamentally unmarriable about me?'
(trapped) Uh, uh.'
Well?'
Dear God! This parachute is a knapsack! (throws himself over the back\nof the chair he was sitting in)'
Nice try.'
Wait, wait, wait! (She puts a Shriner's hat on the turkey.)"
Look, Monica\xc2\x85'
Look! (She puts a big, yellow pair of sunglasses on the bird.)'
This is not going to work.'
I bet this will work! (She starts dancing and Chandler cracks up.)'
You are so great! I love you!'
What?'
Nothing! I said, I said "You\'re so great" and then I just, I\njust stopped talking!'
You said you loved me! I can't believe this!"
No I didn't!"
Yes, you did!'
No I didn't!"
You love me!'
No I don't! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!"
\xc2\xa0 Y\xc2\x92know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here?'
Then all your stuff would be here.'
Well, what if all my stuff was here?'
Then you\xc2\x92d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it\ndoesn\xc2\x92t make any sense.'
Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I\xc2\x92m\nsaying?'
You wanted it to be a surprise.'
Oh my God.'

Chandler\xc2\x85 In all my life\xc2\x85 I never thought I would be so lucky.\n(Starting to cry.) As to\xc2\x85fall in love with my best\xc2\x85my best\xc2\x85 There\xc2\x92s a\nreason why girls don\xc2\x92t do this!'

Okay! (He joins her on one knee) Okay! Okay! I'll do it!\xc2\xa0 Oh God,
I thought\xc2\x85 (Starting to cry, pauses) Wait a minute, I-I can do this. (Pause) I
thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing
that matters is that you, (Pause) you make me happier than I ever thought I could be.
(Starting to cry again.) And if you\xc2\x92ll let me, I will spend the rest of my life
trying to make you feel the same way. (Pause as he gets out the ring.) Monica, will you
marry me?"
Yes.'
(yelling through the door) Can we come it yet?! We\xc2\x92re dying out here!'
Come in! Come in! (Joey, Rachel, and Phoebe burst through the door.)\nWe\xc2\x92re engaged!!!'
Hey!'
Hey!'
Hey!'
Hey!'
Hey, what have you guys been up to?'
Oh, we were helping Chandler write his vows, but he kicked us out because\nJoey kept making inappropriate suggestions.'
How is "Monica, I love your sweet ass," inappropriate?'
How\xc2\x92s Monica coming along with her vows?'
Well let\xc2\x92s just say its she\xc2\x92s lucky she has a sweet ass,\n\xc2\x91cause she\xc2\x92s not so good at the writing.'
I can\xc2\x92t believe in four weeks they\xc2\x92re gonna be married!'
Well let\xc2\x92s just hope it works. Y\xc2\x92know nine out of ten\nmarriages end in divorce?'
Phoebe that\xc2\x92s not true.'
Yeah, you\xc2\x92re right. How\xc2\x92s the Mrs.?'
I can\xc2\x92t believe they\xc2\x92ve been together for three years.'
(shocked) Has it been that long?!'
Believe me, it seems like less because they hid it from us for so long.'
Hey, it's me! I'm comin' in!"
I've had a very long, hard day."
Ahh, I'm gonna go get some chicken. Want some?"
Ahh, no thanks. No chicken, bye-bye then.'
Okay.'
Are you okay? I'm so sorry, he wouldn't leave. He kept asking me about\nchicken."
Chicken? I could eat some chicken.'
Hey Joe!'
Yeah, can I get a 3-piece, some cole slaw, some beans, and a Coke\xc2\x97(Yelps\nin pain as Monica grabs him underwater)\xc2\x97Diet Coke.'
I don\xc2\x92t know why they didn\xc2\x92t just tell us.'
I know! I mean it\xc2\x92s not like we weren\xc2\x92t cool about it.'
(To Chandler) You?! (To Monica) And-and you?!'
Yes, but you cannot tell anyone! No one knows!'
How?! When?!'
It happened in London.'
IN LONDON!!!'
The reason we didn't tell anyone was because we didn't want to make a\nbig deal out of it."
But it is a big deal!! I have to tell someone! '
No-no-no-no-no! You can't!"
Please? Please?! We just don't want to deal with telling everyone, okay?\nJust promise you won't tell."
All right! Man, this is unbelievable!'
(on phone) I can't wait to be with you!\xc2\xa0 I'll just tell Rachel I'm\ngonna be doing laundry for a couple of hours."
(on phone) Laundry. Huh. Is that my new nickname? (Rachel is\nabsolutely stunned, she opens her mouth in absolute amazement.)'
(on phone) Awww, y'know what your nickname is, Mr. Big\xc2\x85"
Arghh!! (She quickly hangs up the phone and starts to pace around\nwondering what to do.)'
(looking out the window) Oh, look! There's Monica and Chandler! (Starts\nyelling.) Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! (Chandler and Monica start taking each other's clothes\noff.) Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!"
What?!'
(screaming) Ahhh!! Chandler and Monica!! Chandler and Monica!!'
Oh my God!'
CHANDLER AND MONICA!!!!'
OH MY GOD!!!'
OH!! MY EYES!!! MY EYES!!!!'
Phoebe!! Phoebe!! It's okay!! It's okay!!"
NO! THEY'RE DOING IT!!!"
I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!'
YOU KNOW?!!!'
Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn't know so you have to stop\nscreaming!!"
(entering) What's going on?"
Ohhh!!!'
(trying to divert his attention from the window by jumping up and down)\nHI!! Hi! '
What?! What?!'
Nothing! Oh God, we're just so excited that you want to get this\napartment!"
Actually, it looks really good. (Turns towards the window and now Phoebe\nstarts jumping to divert his attention.)'
(Screaming incoherently.) Get in here!!! (Motions to join her and\nRachel.)'
Okay, so now they know that you know and they don't know that Rachel\nknows?"
Yes, but y'know what? It doesn't matter who knows what. Now, enough of us\nknow that we can just tell them that we know! Then all the lying and the secrets would\nfinally be over!"
Or, we could not tell them we know and have a little fun of our\nown'
All right honey, we'd better go if we wanna catch that movie."
Bye!'
Bye!'
Bye Chandler! (She walks up to him.) (Quietly.) I miss you already. (She\npinches his butt.)'
(after they've left) Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate\nand the pinching!!"
Actually, I did!'
Okay, so now do you believe that she's attracted to me?"
Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!'
Phoebe knows about us!'
Well I didn't tell them!"
Them?! Who's them?"
Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.'
Joey!'
And Rachel. I would've told you but they made me promise not to tell!"
Oh man, they think they are so slick messing with us! But see\nthey don't know that we know that they know! So\xc2\x85"
Ahh yes, the messers become the messies!'
I'll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! (Hangs up.) Oh my God!\nHe wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!"
Are you kidding?!'
No!'
I can not believe he would do that to Mon\xc2\x97Whoa! (She stops suddenly\nand slowly turns to point at Joey. Joey is avoiding her eyes.) Joey, do they know that we\nknow?'
No.'
Joey!'
They know you know.'
Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!'
God, they thought they can mess with us! They're trying to mess with\nus?! They don't know that we know they know we know! (Joey just shakes his head.) Joey,\nyou can't say anything!"
I couldn't even if I wanted too."
Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put\nlotion on her! '
She's bluffing!"
Look, she's not backing down! She went like this! (He does a little\nmimic of her dance.)"
He's not backing down. He went to get lotion."
(entering the hall) Oh man! Aren't you guys done yet?!"
Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler\nthe sooner this is all over and out in the open.'
Ooh!'
Okay!'
I like that! (To Phoebe) Oh, okay! Show him your bra! He's afraid of bras!\nCan't work 'em! (He swiftly rips open the front of Phoebe's dress revealing her bra.)"
Joey! (Examining the dress.) Wow, you didn\xc2\x92t rip off any buttons.'
It's not my first time."
You go back out there and you seduce her till she cracks!'
Okay, give me a second! (Pause) Did you clean up in here?'
Of course.'
Oh, you're-you're going?"
Umm, not without you, lover. (She slowly walks over to him and is\nshowcasing her bra.) So, this is my bra.'
(swallowing hard) It's very, very nice. Well, come here. I'm very\nhappy were gonna have all the sex."
You should be. I'm very bendy. (Pause) I'm gonna kiss you now."
Not if I kiss you first.'
Ooh.'
Well, I guess there's nothing left for us to do but-but kiss."
Here it comes. Our first kiss.'
Okay! Okay! Okay! You win! You win!! I can't have sex with ya!"
And why not?!'
Because I'm in love with Monica!!"
You're-you're what?!"
Love her! That's right, I\xc2\x85LOVE\xc2\x85HER!!! I love her!! (They\nwalk together and hug.) I love you, Monica."
I love you too Chandler. (They kiss.)'
I just\xc2\x97I thought you guys were doing it, I didn't know you were in\nlove!"
\xc2\xa0 So that's it! It's over! Everybody knows!"
Well actually, Ross doesn't."
Yes, and we'd appreciate it if no one told him yet."
(He notices something through the window.) No! No! Wh\xc2\x85 What are you\ndoing?!! (Dr. Ledbetter is slowly backing away.) GET OFF MY SISTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!'
Y\xc2\x92know, you\xc2\x92re friend\xc2\x92s getting married, it\xc2\x92s gotta\nchange things.'
You really think it would be that different?'

How could it not be? I mean pretty soon they\xc2\x92re gonna be having
kids, and then they\xc2\x92re just gonna be hanging out with other couples who have kids.
And then maybe they\xc2\x92re gonna have to leave the city to be near a Volvo
dealership.'
Well, things change.'
I don\xc2\x92t want them to move to a Volvo dealership!'
It\xc2\x92ll be okay Joe.'
I\xc2\x92m sorry, I just\xc2\x85I like things the way they are.'
Hey, who's this little naked guy?"
That little naked guy would be me.'
Aww, look at the little thing.'
Yes, yes, fine, that is my penis. Can we be grown-ups now?'
Who are those people?'
Got me.'
Oh, that's Nana, right there in the middle. (Reads the back) 'Me and the\ngang at Java Joe's'. "
Wow, Monica, you look just like your grandmother. How old was she there?'
Looks like a fun gang. (They all look at each other and smile)'
Ooh, look-look-look-look-look! I got Monica naked!'
(looking) Nono, that would be me again.'
Hey, you guys!'
Hey.'
Hey.'
What\xc2\x92s going on?'
Well, we were just talkin\xc2\x92 about you guys gettin\xc2\x92 married and\nhow great it is.'
Yeah, you can get a Volvo. If that\xc2\x92s what you really want.'
Oh that\xc2\x92s so sweet.'
So we both finished our vows.'
Oh!'
Hey!'
Oh, can we read them?'
Yeah, I don\xc2\x92t hear Chandler\xc2\x92s and he doesn\xc2\x92t hear mine.'
Okay.'
Okay.'
(To Monica) Oh, that\xc2\x92s beautiful.'
(To Chandler) (laughing) Funny one! That\xc2\x92s good!'
(To Monica) Monica, will-will you marry me?'
What? I don\xc2\x92t get it.'
(To Chandler) Oh man, this is hilarious.'
Chandler!!'
Don\xc2\x92t worry honey, we\xc2\x92ll make yours funnier.'
Okay, what do you guys think?'
(quietly) Dude!'
(starting to cry) I have never known love like this.'
You really like it?'
Dude! How-how did you write this?'
I stole Monica\xc2\x92s and changed the name.'
You can\xc2\x92t do that!'
If he goes first he can!'
